divs: Sighting DetailsOn Sat July 10th around 11pm I went to my back deck to see if our dog was ok, she hadn't been fed and I went to feed her. I looked up at the sky because it was such a clear evening at the time it had rained earlier and storms were in the area but at this point it was clear. I looked up and instantly a star I thought made a leap across the sky to me it looked like if I held out my arms straight out from my sides then held them above my head that is the distance it went and I'm sure in the sky that was a long way, it did it INSTANTLY I told myself maybe i am mistaken so I watched and it moved again back instead of from side to side and it started twinkling it went from white to a light orange to red, so I got a chair and sat down and watched it a while then it slowly moved to the west of Nashville where there were 2 more similar to it,. This isn't the first UFO I have seen in my 49 years so I watched them a while then got tired, and went inside to get ready for bed, just before I went to bed about 35mins later I stuck my head outside and looked in that direction and they were gone. So Star-Like moving very fast and with 90 degree turns... M youngblood
Summary: Moving Object, that was not a satilite
trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around July 10th 2009
